name: Alrik's Father
description:
Alrik's father was the unnamed king of the Barbarians of the east and father of Alrik.
God of War Comics[]
Alrik's father fell ill from a curse secretly deployed by Hades, God of the Underworld, as motivation for Alrik in the Wager of the Gods. The King was suffering from the "living sleep", which locked him in the Land of Morpheus until his life drained away.
in a desperate attempt to save him, Alrik ventured forth on a quest for the healing drink of the gods, Ambrosia, having been informed of its abilities by an elder.
Alrik failed however, as the Spartan warrior Kratos (the champion of Ares) captured the Ambrosia to save his daughter from an innate illness. Returning home empty handed, Alrik saw his father, who had succumbed to his illness, being cremated. Having been crowned the new Barbarian King shortly after, Alrik vowed vengeance on Kratos.
